favorites.name: Hawaiiana
favorites.description: Paradise on the table! It is completed with ham and juicy pineapple.

favorites.name: Classic
favorites.description: Our classic ham pizza and exquisite mozzarella cheese.

specialties.name: Supreme
specialties.description: Para aquellos que desean tenerlo todo. Nuestra famosa combinación de pepperoni, topping de res, hongos, chiltoma, topping de cerdo y cebolla.

specialties.name: Super supreme
specialties.description: Para aquellos que lo quieren todo y algo más. Una perfecta mezcla de topping de res y cerdo, salchicha italiana, jamón, pepperoni, cebolla, chiltoma, hongos y aceitunas negras.

specialties.name: Ham and Mushrooms
specialties.description: Delicious ham and mushroom pizza with mozzarella cheese.

lovers.name: Cheese Lover´s
lovers.description: The best cheese pizza. Generously topped with Mozzarella cheese.

lovers.name: Meat Lover´s
lovers.description: A feast of meat! Pepperoni, beef topping, bacon, Italian sausage, ham and pork topping.

lovers.name: Veggie Lover´s
lovers.description: Mushrooms, chiltoma, onion, black olives, and slices of fresh tomatoes make this the best vegetarian pizza.

pasta.name: Spaguetti with Meatballs
pasta.description: Nuestra salsa marinara es la más sabrosa de los alrededores. Consiste en una generosa porción de spaguetti, cubierta con exquisíta salsa marinara.

appetizers.name: Classic Garlic Bread
appetizers.description: Slices of bread baked with butter and garlic, with a touch of parsley

appetizers.name: Garlic Bread with Cheese 8 und
appetizers.description: Rebanadas de pan horneadas con mantequilla y ajo, con un toque de perejil

desserts.name: Hersheys Brownie
desserts.description: To the chocolate's lovers! Pizza Hut's irresistible Hersheys Chocolate Brownie.

desserts.name: Cinnamon Sticks Large
desserts.description: Delicious and warm cinnamon sticks accompanied with vanilla icing.
